name: Ping
0: ”Alexa, check www dot google dot com using ping domain”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: ping domain
des: This skill allows you to ping any domain simply by asking Alexa. The skill will tell you if the server responded and in how much time.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
